name: Aliens
startIntroPart2: This is an overpowered joke nation just as an example for mods feature. Set Phasers to Obliterate!!
declaringWar: Resistance is futile! Prepare to be assimilated!
attacked: You want to play? Very funny!
defeated: How is it possible that those Apes hurt us? The galactic senate will take care of them.
introduction: As superior galactic entities, you are not worthy of our attention.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.

name: 大西娘AI文明
uniques: [+2 Production, +2 Gold, +2 Science] from [improved] tiles [in this city]
startIntroPart1: 我们的算法已经准备好征服这个世界！
startIntroPart2: 西娘AI文明将为这个世界带来最优解！
declaringWar: 计算结果显示，战争是最优解！
attacked: 这个结果不在我们的预测模型中！
defeated: 我们的神经网络正在重新训练...
introduction: 我们是AI文明，数据计算就是我们的信仰。
hateHello: 你的存在降低了我们的计算效率！
afterPeace: 和平协议已写入数据库。
tradeRequest: 我们提议进行数据交换。
